document_data.name: Glorious Raiment
document_data.level3e: {{spell table|edition=3e|[[Apostle of peace|Apostle of Peace]]|2|[[Glory domain|Glory]]|2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Glorious raiment''''' was a [[divine]] [[abjuration]] [[spell]] that imbued clothing with divine power.
document_data.Effect: A robe, priestly vestments, or even ordinary clothes thus imbued granted a blessed protection against attacks and reduced injuries made by weapons, except from those of evil nature. Although anyone could wear these blessed clothes, only good beings got this protection.
document_data.Components: It required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s and a [[divine focus]]. As well as a set of clothes, of course.
